verses.verse: And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2332>Eve<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H7069>gotten<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H854>from<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And she <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1893>Abel.<s%> And <S%H1893>Abel<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H7462>keeper<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> but <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H5647>tiller<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

And in <S%H4480>process<s%> <S%H7093><s%> of <S%H3117>time<s%> it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> of the <S%H4480>firstlings<s%> <S%H1062><s%> of his <S%H6629>flock<s%> and of the <S%H4480>fat<s%> <S%H2459><s%> thereof. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H8159>respect<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his offering: <S%H4503><s%>

But <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H4503>offering<s%> he had not <S%H8159>respect.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> and his <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H5307>fell.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> art thou <S%H2734>wroth?<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> is thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H5307>fallen?<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou doest <S%H3190>well,<s%> shalt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7613>accepted?<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> thou doest <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H7257>lieth<s%> at the <S%H6607>door.<s%> And <S%H413>unto<s%> thee shall be his <S%H8669>desire,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H4910>rule<s%> over him.

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>talked<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> his <S%H251>brother:<s%> and it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when they <S%H1961>were<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> is <S%H1893>Abel<s%> thy <S%H251>brother?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> Am <S%H595>I<s%> my <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8104>keeper?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>done?<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H6817>crieth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> art <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H779>cursed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H127>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H6475>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from thy <S%H4480>hand;<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H5647>tillest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> unto thee her <S%H3581>strength;<s%> a <S%H5128>fugitive<s%> and a <S%H5110>vagabond<s%> shalt thou <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> My <S%H5771>punishment<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> than I can <S%H4480>bear.<s%> <S%H5375><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> thou hast driven me <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth;<s%> and from thy <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> shall I be <S%H5641>hid;<s%> and I shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5128>fugitive<s%> and a <S%H5110>vagabond<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H4672>findeth<s%> me shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> me.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H2026>slayeth<s%> <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> vengeance shall be <S%H5358>taken<s%> on him <S%H7659>sevenfold.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>mark<s%> upon <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H1115>lest<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4672>finding<s%> him should <S%H5221>kill<s%> him.

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5113>Nod,<s%> on the <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden.<s%>

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2585>Enoch:<s%> and he <S%H1961>built<s%> <S%H1129><s%> a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2585>Enoch.<s%>

And unto <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5897>Irad:<s%> and <S%H5897>Irad<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4232>Mehujael:<s%> and <S%H4232>Mehujael<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4967>Methusael:<s%> and <S%H4967>Methusael<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3929>Lamech.<s%>

And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> unto him <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H5711>Adah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6741>Zillah.<s%>

And <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2989>Jabal:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of such as <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents,<s%> and of such as have <S%H4735>cattle.<s%>

And his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3106>Jubal:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> such as <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H3658>harp<s%> and <S%H5748>organ.<s%>

And <S%H6741>Zillah,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8423>Tubal-cain,<s%> an <S%H3913>instructor<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2794>artificer<s%> in <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H8423>Tubal-cain<s%> was <S%H5279>Naamah.<s%>

And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H5711>Adah<s%> and <S%H6741>Zillah,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> ye <S%H802>wives<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech,<s%> <S%H238>hearken<s%> unto my <S%H565>speech:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to my <S%H6482>wounding,<s%> and a young <S%H3206>man<s%> to my <S%H2250>hurt.<s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> shall be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold,<s%> truly <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7651>sevenfold.<s%>

And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5750>again;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853>his<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8352>Seth:<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> said she, hath <S%H7896>appointed<s%> me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> whom <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H2026>slew.<s%>

And to <S%H8352>Seth,<s%> to <S%H1931>him<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> there was <S%H3205>born<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H583>Enos:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> men to <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
